revisionDesc.change: extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

opener.dateline:
431 Stevens st.
Camden,
N. Jersey. June 22, 1874.

body.p: Would it be convenient to the President to personally request of the Attorney General that in any changes in the Solicitor Treasury's office, I be not disturbed in my position as clerk in that office—all my duties to the government being & having been thoroughly & regularly performed there, by a substitute, during my illness.
I shall probably get well before long.
